---
name: 13<sup>th</sup> Black Crusade Black Legion Epic Tournament Special Rules
---
The summoning point costs for a 13<sup>th</sup> Black Crusade Black Legion army are below. If a row contains a point cost in parentheses than this is the cost for formations that owe allegiance to Chaos Undivided.

      </tr>
    </thead>

      <tr>
        <td>Daemonic Beasts</td>
        <td>Any</td>
        <td class="_text_right">1</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Bloodletters</td>
        <td>Khorne</td>
        <td class="_text_right">1 (2)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Plaguebearers</td>
        <td>Nurgle</td>
        <td class="_text_right">1 (2)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Daemonettes</td>
        <td>Slaanesh</td>
        <td class="_text_right">1 (2)</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
